name: The HDTV Genie
description: The first dedicated HDTV  product finder
tag_list: hdtv-shopping, best-hdtv-finder, hdtv-reviews, best-hdtv-2011, best-hdtv-2012, online-shopping-comparison-engine, product-finder, bargain-shopping
overview:
The HDTV Genie is the first true dedicated “HDTV Finder”, that acts a tool to collect buying criteria from the user about their room environment, viewing preferences and price range in order to recommend the best HDTV for their unique home setup.

The website takes a consumer-friendly approach of providing a visual method of delivering a questionnaire to the user, calculating that data against thousands of models, and returning not only the best models but also complimentary products such as compatible mounting brackets, tv stands, and home theater systems.
